rx.operators

Class OperatorReplay

  • java.lang.Object
    • rx.operators.OperatorReplay

  • public final class OperatorReplay
extends java.lang.Object
    Replay with limited buffer and/or time constraints.
    See Also:
    MSDN: Observable.Replay overloads

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  OperatorReplay.CustomReplaySubject<TInput,TIntermediate,TResult>
      A customizable replay subject with support for transformations.
      protected static class  OperatorReplay.CustomReplaySubjectSubscribeFunc<TIntermediate,TResult>
      The subscription function.
      static class  OperatorReplay.SubjectWrapper<T>
      A subject that wraps another subject.
      static class  OperatorReplay.VirtualArrayList<T>
      Behaves like a normal, unbounded ArrayList but with virtual index.
      static class  OperatorReplay.VirtualBoundedList<T>
      A bounded list which increases its size up to a maximum capacity, then behaves like a circular buffer with virtual indexes.
      static interface  OperatorReplay.VirtualList<T>
      Base interface for logically indexing a list.

      • replayWindowed

        public static <T> Subject<T,T> replayWindowed(long time,
                              java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit,
                              int bufferSize,
                              Scheduler scheduler)
        Create a CustomReplaySubject with the given time window length and optional buffer size.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the source and return type
        Parameters:
        time - the length of the time window
        unit - the unit of the time window length
        bufferSize - the buffer size if >= 0, otherwise, the buffer will be unlimited
        scheduler - the scheduler from where the current time is retrieved. The observers will not observe on this scheduler.
        Returns:
        a Subject with the required replay behavior

        public static <T> Observable.OnSubscribe<T> subscriberOf(Observable<T> target)
        Return an OnSubscribeFunc which delegates the subscription to the given observable.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the value type
        Parameters:
        target - the target observable
        Returns:
        the function that delegates the subscription to the target
